content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)
Consists of steam engine, boiler at position(x=1.5, y=1.0) and offshore pump at position(x=-11.5, y=26.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=1.5, y=1.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Boiler at position(x=1.5, y=1.0) 
-  Offshore pump at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5)
-  Offshore pump at position(x=-11.5, y=26.5)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
-  PipeGroup at position(x=1.5, y=-6.5)
-  PipeGroup at position(x=3.5, y=-2.5)
-  PipeGroup at position(x=-5.5, y=25.5)
-  ElectricityGroup at position(x=7.5, y=-0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
-  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Errors when trying to connect entities
- Check if the entities are compatible for connection
- Ensure the entities are at a valid connection point

### Errors when trying to get entities
- Ensure the entity exists on the map before trying to get it
- Check the prototype of the entity to ensure it matches the expected one

### Errors when trying to place pipe
- Ensure the tile where the pipe is being placed is not occupied by water or another entity
- Check the position of the pipe to ensure it is valid

### Errors when trying to build
- Ensure the building box is valid and the prototype is correct
- Check the position of the building to ensure it is valid
